solution_line_template: After making her omelet and cake, she was left with {total_eggs_initial} - {omelet_eggs} - {cake_eggs} = <<{total_eggs_initial}-{omelet_eggs}-{cake_eggs}={eggs_after_baking}>>{eggs_after_baking} eggs
After giving half to her aunt, she was left with {eggs_after_baking}/{aunt_share_divisor} = <<{eggs_after_baking}/{aunt_share_divisor}={eggs_after_aunt_share}>>{eggs_after_aunt_share}
Megan would have {eggs_after_aunt_share}/{num_meals} = <<{eggs_after_aunt_share}/{num_meals}={eggs_per_meal}>>{eggs_per_meal} eggs per meal for the next three meals.
